game_description: Playing with blocks is easy? Think again! Tease your brain with clever VR puzzling in the playful, handcrafted world of PathCraft, a deceptively simple puzzle platformer where you play with blocks to complete increasingly complex puzzles. Keep on your toes and react quickly to guide your little mini-me and successfully complete its path. Next up, you can build and share your own levels with the level editor. review_1: I just bought PathCraft for my Oculus Quest 2 and I have to say, I am impressed! I was blown away by the level of quality and attention to detail in the game. The environments are absolutely beautiful and the high refresh rate and clear image make for an great immersive experience. This is a great gateway for those new to VR. It is easy to pick up and won't make you dizzy. The gameplay itself is a lot of fun, but don't be fooled - it gets challenging quickly. The level editor is a great addition and allows for endless possibilities of play. The cute character and lovely costumes are just the cherry on top. Overall, I highly recommend it to any VR enthusiast and newcomer.

review_4: **Will update the review once I'm deeper in the game** The game is very pretty, smooth and the music is charming. Everything fits together very well, like a puzzle! Talking about puzzles, the game itself present puzzle with increasing difficulty. The complexity of the puzzles varies from a very simple straight puzzle, to multiple turns and even horizontal levels. The mechanics are super simple making it a perfect game for the family or to play sitting on a week night where you just want to free your mind and have some pure fun. Grab the game, it's a great fun!
review_5: Fun and cute game that reminds me a little bit of Lemmings. The puzzles are fun and challenging but never overwhelming (though I haven't finished all puzzles yet). I love the hand-painted style and the level of details in the environments- You don't want to leave the game once you're in it.
